title: Accessibility
text: I'm a big advocate of accessiblity and have a wide range of experience of producing accessible websites and apps.

title: CSS
text: I've worked with everything from plain CSS and SASS through to React with Styled Components and CSS Modules.

title: HTML
text: I'm intimately familiar with HTML, a skill that seems to have fallen by the wayside in the abstracted world of front end frameworks.

title: JavaScript
text: I've worked with vanilla Javascript along with libraries such as jQuery.

title: React
text: I've worked extensively with ReactJS and various associated frameworks such as NextJS and Gatsby.

title: TypeScript
text: I've been using TypeScript in pretty much every project.
